ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, from the tests I ran up to level 40, and comments I ve been getting from casters I m grouped with, it seems the per-level improvement of bard
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 21 Mar 2000, JasonF wrote:
>
> Enchanters are getting Clarity II, I would expect that we're getting a
> similar upgrade to our 32nd song. If not I'm going to be pretty hostile.

Actually, from the tests I ran up to level 40, and comments
I've been getting from casters I'm grouped with, it seems the
per-level improvement of bard Clarity far outpaces the
per-level improvement of enchanter Clairty. If the mana regen
speedup is what I think it is, at level 60 bard Clarity will
regen mana roughly twice as fast as the current enchanter
Clarity at L60. They are due for an upgrade.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
